Mulan

Rank: 92


To save her father from death in the army- a young maiden secretly goes in his place and becomes one of China's greatest heroines in the process.


Director: Tony Bancroft

Writer: Robert D. San Souci, Rita Hsiao, Chris Sanders

Stars: Ming,Na Wen, Eddie Murphy, BD Wong

Tags: Coming,of,Age, Hand,Drawn Animation, Martial Arts, Period Drama, Pop Musical, Quest, Adventure, Animation, Comedy, Family
